org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea

Interface StatusListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener

    public interface StatusListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    Fired when the text area needs to display a status message.
    Since:
    jEdit 4.3pre2
